title: Unspecified Error
body: I've been having this issue since the 6.20 update and have been trying everything people have suggested, please help. I've reinstalled like 4 times, deleted projects, air client, done the hex tech repair tool, but it fixes nothing and I've even reset my computer but nothing seems to work.  I can install the game till like 90% when it is applying patches then the error message appears after I launch league again the progress bar will be at 33% and calculating differences and after a long period of time a progress bar like this will appear (https://gyazo.com/2e9f762dc9f916c1497f3fa86fb8ffc4)  along with the Unspecified Error will appear again. PLEASE HELP ME D:

replies.body: It seems like you're having a weak connection, so the patcher is having trouble staying connected to the patching servers.  It's constantly having to go back and pick up lost pieces or failing to download any update at all.  Your best bet is to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and restore that connection to the server.  Let me know if you have any questions.
I'm on a wired connection and my brother who has a wired connection can play league but I can't? I've disabled my firewalls but i still get this error message.
